events.name: Amelia Earhart’s Lockheed Electra 10E Found In Pieces On Nikumaroro Island Using Google Earth! UFO UAP Sighting News. Wow!
events.description: A new study suggests that Amelia Earhart's disappearance on July 2, 1937, may have been more than just an accident. Researchers claim to have found evidence on Nikumaroro Island in the Pacific Ocean that points to a possible explanation for her vanishing. According to eyewitnesses who reported seeing Earhart's plane go missing, she was last seen taking off from Rarotonga Airport before disappearing into thin air. However, the investigation team was unable to verify any conclusive evidence, leaving questions about what really happened on that fateful day.

events.name: Buga Sphere in Colombia Seen Again In China, June 5, 2025, UFO UAP Sighting News. Video!
events.description: A recent UFO sighting in China, reported on June 5, 2025, has garnered significant attention due to its unusual behavior and potential significance. The witness account describes a metallic spherical object flying eastward above the water surface from the west side of Shayukou Reservoir. However, the object's ability to hover and move behind trees despite no wind suggests it may be capable of extraordinary propulsion or manipulation. While the sighting remains unverified, witnesses report that the sphere reappeared in the south after being observed for a few minutes, sparking curiosity about its intentions. Further investigation is warranted to determine the source of this phenomenon.
